sentences.sContent: Illinois boasts convenient transportation and developed economy, and is one of the most agriculturally developed regions in the world.
sentences.sContent_eng: Illinois boasts convenient transportation and developed economy, and is one of the most agriculturally developed regions in the world.
sentences.sCn: 伊利诺伊州交通便利、经济发达，是世界上农业最发达的地区之一；

sentences.sContent: For this reason, agriculturally-based economic growth is two to four times more effective in reducing poverty than growth in other sectors.
sentences.sContent_eng: For this reason, agriculturally-based economic growth is two to four times more effective in reducing poverty than growth in other sectors.
sentences.sCn: 鉴于这一点，以农业为基础的经济增长在减贫方面的效果是其它行业增长的2-4倍。

sentences.sContent: Aid groups say the drive by large corporations to produce agriculturally derived biofuels in Africa are further squeezing the continent's food supply, while pushing up prices.
sentences.sContent_eng: Aid groups say the drive by large corporations to produce agriculturally derived biofuels in Africa are further squeezing the continent's food supply, while pushing up prices.
sentences.sCn: 此外，援助机构说，大企业用农作物开发生物燃料的做法抬高了粮食价格，进一步威胁到非洲大陆的粮食供应。
